title: Summer Olympics Events
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 771 words, Level Q (Grade 3), Lexile 880L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     H and K		                 
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     H and K		                 
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     H and K
description: Summer Olympics Events is an informational book that describes some of the sports in which athletes compete during the Summer Olympic Games. Readers will learn about different types of water sports, gymnastics, and track-and-field events. Photographs help students make text-to-picture connections. Book and lesson also available at Levels H and K.
highFrequencyWords: athletes, ceremony, competition, dashes, duel, gymnasts, marathon, pentathlon, scenario
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
comprehension: Plural Nouns : Recognize plural nouns formed by adding -s and -es
awareness: Concept Words                : Understand and identify number words
phonics:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
